storyInfo: Demonic fragments accidentally sown into the ground a thousand years ago have now become the nexus of a threat looming over all Dahuang. In the midst of mass despair, Shu steps into the fields.

attributes.content: It was just like a dream.
She traversed a great, long journey, crossing mountains and ridges in the ice and snow, reaching an endless field of rice at the end of the road.
The rich stalks glimmered like gold. She did not know who had planted them here, or why they grew so prosperously.
How wonderful.
'Then, stay here.'
She hears a voice calling out to her.
No... No.
She remembers her unfinished business, and the place she must return to.
She picks up a stalk of rice.
A vague figure waves a hoe around, burying seeds in a plot.
You're back?! Thank goodness, everyone was waiting for you!
attributes.name: Busy Farmer

attributes.content: You were gone so long. Did the trip go smoothly? Did you find the crops you were searching for?
attributes.name: Busy Farmer

attributes.content: Laoshi... Are you alright? You look a bit...
attributes.name: Busy Farmer

attributes.content: Wh-What is this?!
attributes.name: Busy Farmer

attributes.content: Help! Someone!
attributes.name: Busy Farmer

attributes.content: Xiaohe? You're still here?
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: I found it...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The contamination... It didn't come with the flood. The source must be underground.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: If we gather the Tianshi Bureaus, it might not be too late to start researching now!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: There's no need to bother with that.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: We've already decided to abandon these lands...
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: It won't take that much time! Give me maybe two or three days, and I should be able to pinpoint the source of the contamination! There must be a solution!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Every bit of land here in Dahuang was hard-won. We haven't put in anywhere near that much effort yet, so how could we just give up—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It's not just a few plots of land. It's the entire city.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: What...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Everyone is to move into the core city and follow it east, leaving behind all the other fields here by tomorrow.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: The other Tianshis are getting everyone together to prepare for the move. This is what matters most right now... You should go help them.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Whose... idea was this?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Who else could order the entire city relocated?
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Why...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: All these experimental fields, and these newly-planted crops...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This has already been a famine year. If we give up on these crops, how many more people are going to go hungry?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It'll be just like it used to be...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: We've tried our best.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Evacuate the people as soon as possible. Establish post-disaster countermeasures in advance. You are a Tianshi, so have your priorities straight at a time like this—
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Is the legend true...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What nonsense are you spouting now...?
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: What's hidden in the permafrost on the north bank of the river? It's those things that contaminated our land, isn't it?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Just treat it like any other Catastrophe.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: There've been so many things we couldn't protect over the years...
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: The people aren't just going to leave.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This is our land. Nobody's going to leave until we figure out exactly what's going on.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: If Shennong could keep these enemies from our homes, then so can we.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Is it an illusion?
The vast fields in front of him instantly turn empty and barren.
No, it's not that the fields have turned barren. Rather, Heaven and earth are being invaded by a foreign space. It warps beyond the recognition of any soul.
What's going on over there?!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It's too late...
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Shu, what in tarnation was that...?
attributes.name: Terrified Farmer

attributes.content: Laoshi... is she sick? How did she become like this?
attributes.name: Terrified Farmer

attributes.content: Give her... a proper burial.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: The thin, emaciated body falls to the cold, hard ground, a small pack of seeds tucked in the pocket of her flimsy shirt.
Are these the seeds she brought back? Did she manage to find the legendary seeds?
attributes.name: Terrified Farmer

attributes.content: Our harvests have been terrible the last couple of years. Maybe with this packet of seeds, there's some hope after all.
attributes.name: Terrified Farmer

attributes.content: Let's take it back...
attributes.name: Terrified Farmer

attributes.content: How'd the demonic contamination end up underground?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Isn't the Chamber of Heaven's Designs standing guard outside? How did the contaminants get past the old one and make their way inside?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Based on current observations, the contamination here likely existed long before the Chamber of Heaven's Designs did.
attributes.name: Tianshi of the Chamber

attributes.content: The underground area here is already highly contaminated.
attributes.name: Tianshi of the Chamber

attributes.content: But, the demonic influence here hasn't spread in all these years. Was it because of her?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But, why now of all times...? Could she have...?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: The Chamber has likely already determined the source of this calamity. But, the top priority remains dealing with the crisis at hand.
attributes.name: Tianshi of the Chamber

attributes.content: The impact of this demonic catastrophe is unprecedented, and well beyond the scope of any of the Chamber's plans.
attributes.name: Tianshi of the Chamber

attributes.content: That's clear from the fact that you Chamber Tianshis actually called me up... So, what options do we still have?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Have all the Chamber's forces on the north bank withdraw, and at the same time, have the demon defense line pull back fifty kilometers to the south.
attributes.name: Tianshi of the Chamber

attributes.content: Abandon all plots, and evacuate to the core city. After that, we'll need your help activating the core city's defenses, and re-establishing a defensive line using the core city as a barrier.
attributes.name: Tianshi of the Chamber

attributes.content: This plan doesn't tally up how many people are going to be sacrificed.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Demonic taint is not like any ordinary calamity. It must be nipped in the bud.
attributes.name: Tianshi of the Chamber

attributes.content: I've never seen Yan make such a rough call before. Who ordered it?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Was it your big boss, the great and unknowable Old Tianshi?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Just do as you're told, and don't ask too many questions.
attributes.name: Tianshi of the Chamber

attributes.content: What are you looking at?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Why would she do this?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: She probably doesn't want to leave though...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: If the demons had already contaminated the land all the way back then... She's been single-handedly suppressing it all this time.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: A thousand years... What would it feel like to have your consciousness gnawed by demons for a thousand years...?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Shu... Good grief...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: There's no other way?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: There's nothing we can do. You can't whisk everyone away inside a painting, and I can't build a castle out of thin air to carry everyone off either.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Then, what about her?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: What do you mean...?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Surely she would've known that this day would eventually come?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The question is... where is she now?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Crying.
The cries came from far away. Babies wailing, old people sobbing. Even the crops in the field are mourning.
Just like the scene from forty years ago.
That was another famine year.
You're... from the Sui Regulator?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.text: Your orders are to farm Dahuang. Catastrophes have been frequent in recent years, and harvests have failed year after year. As a proxy, you clearly have the ability to save these crops, yet you've chosen to stand by and do nothing?

attributes.content: The people can't do what I can.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: If I save them, the people will only think about how to make this 'miracle' happen again.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: But, I can't save them every time... One day, I will be gone.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: And when that time comes, the power I wield now... will become nothing more than the 'root of evil' that harms others.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.text: Is there nothing you can do?

attributes.content: There really isn't much that I can do... other than write down my experiences and pass them down to future generations.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Once the hard years are over, there will be bountiful years to follow. People have always had to rely on themselves to survive.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.text: But how am I to believe that by remaining here, you're doing something good for Yan and its people?

attributes.content: How long are you staying here?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Wait for this year's harvest. You'll see.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: By the way, have you ever worked the land before?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: It's planting season now, and everyone has their hands full. Would you mind lending me a hand?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.text: I vaguely remember that the crops grew particularly well that year.
The plowed rice piled up into little hills, and the farmers said they wouldn't need to worry about Catastrophe for the next few years.

attributes.content: You're smiling?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Are you still going to write me up in your report to the Sui Regulator?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.text: Are you going to stay here forever? Stay here and help us...
With you here, everyone feels safe.

attributes.content: I used to have a friend just like you.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.text: Now, there truly is no other way.
Just once... I'm begging you just this one time.
Can you please save the people here, only once?
You promised me that you'd stay here forever...

attributes.content: Shu...
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: The room is empty.
A warm bowl of soup still sits on the table.
I see... You've already...
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: The rain starts to fall.
It's raining?
attributes.name: Farmer by the Fields

attributes.content: The farmer looks up to see a thin cloud covering the crescent moon in the sky. Shortly thereafter, a few drops of cold rain fall.
Who is that...?
attributes.name: Farmer by the Fields

attributes.content: In the distance, someone walks deeper into the fields.
She walks across the barren fields, and wherever her feet fall, small verdant patches follow.
'Wei, where are you going?'
She does not respond, and simply continues to walk forward.
She walks further and further, until her figure disappears altogether with a thunderclap.
Unlike the heavy rain from just a few days earlier, the rain right now is so tender and fine.
As the rain falls, all the cracks in the land fade away.
And thus, a soul trapped for a thousand years dissipates.
All things will come to grow.
Laoshi?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It's raining?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: As I thought...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Like ink stains blending and blurring with water, the painting sealing this section of space gradually dissipates without a trace.
What just happened?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You were so close...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Why you—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Lord Zuo, I have no intention of becoming your enemy. However, I do hope you take what I said to heart.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: The days ahead of us are long, and there shall come a time when we meet again.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: In the end, this is how it turned out. Just like I said.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: My dear sister... These humans can't do anything without you.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: May you rest well now.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: When you next awaken, everything will be better.
attributes.name: Ji
